text.lobby.team_select.error.game_start: Start countdown is in progress! You cannot change teams at this time.
text.lobby.book.page1.3: This map is based on the
text.lobby.book.page3.2: At the beginning of the game, players are spawned on platforms around the cornucopia. After a short delay, everyone is released and can begin gathering loot. A temporary grace period prevents PvP for a short time.
text.lobby.book.page4.2: Players can get loot from chests around the map. The exact loot is randomly generated each game. Certain chests have better loot, often if they are harder to find or are more dangerous to approach.
text.lobby.book.page5.2: Crafting tables are needed to obtain most gear. They can be found randomly around the map. Anvils can also be found at key locations away from the cornucopia.
text.lobby.book.page6.2: The bossbar at the top of the screen will display different information based on the state of the world border.
text.lobby.book.page6.4: : bossbar will count down the time until the border starts moving
text.lobby.book.page7.3: : bossbar will show the current block size of the border
text.lobby.book.page7.5: : bossbar will count down the time until the game ends in a draw
text.lobby.book.page8.2: The game ends when there is only one team remaining. The game can also end in a draw if no team wins after a certain amount of time.
text.lobby.book.page9.2: The lobby has two primary functions:
text.lobby.book.page9.6: . While waiting for a game to begin, consider exploring the lobby and see what you can find!
text.lobby.book.page10.2: Before starting the game, make sure all players are ready or have selected a team. This can be done using the ender chest in the
text.lobby.book.page10.4: . Use the teleporter item in your inventory to warp to the Admin room. Right click the
text.lobby.book.page11.2: In addition to selecting teams, the
text.lobby.book.page11.4: allows players to customize multiple aspects of the game! Here are brief descriptions of the available settings:
text.lobby.book.page11.6: controls the quality and quantity of chest loot
text.lobby.book.page12.5: disables PvP at the start of the game
text.lobby.book.page12.7: maximum number of players allowed on a team
text.lobby.book.page13.5: controls multiple settings to balance the map for different player counts. The player counts are only suggestions, not requirements!
text.lobby.book.page14.3: the time the border waits before moving at the start of the game
text.lobby.book.page14.5: diameter of the initial world border
text.lobby.book.page15.3: how long until chests get restocked after starting
text.lobby.book.page15.5: how long it takes the border to shrink to its minimum size (50x50) after it starts moving
text.lobby.book.page16.4: provides an opportunity for players to practice their free-for-all combat. Simply jump into the arena and fight until you pass out! The arena layout will change after every game.
text.lobby.book.page17.4: minigame allows players to practice their aim. Located in the back right of the
text.lobby.book.page17.6: , use the small platform to enter the queue. When it's your turn, shoot the pigmen before they reach you! You can drop your bow to leave the game early.
text.lobby.book.page18.6: are available for players who want to assert dominance over others as the top PvPer. Once two players have joined the queue, they will be placed into the next available arena to fight to the death!
text.lobby.book.title: README.txt
text.lobby.settings.special_thanks: Special thanks to Jarmzie, Techno_Guy_KWP, KCisNeat, and GalacticCharlie for their help on the project!
text.lobby.settings.auto_unlock: Settings have been automatically unlocked because all admins disconnected.
text.lobby.settings.permission.grant: You can now edit all settings!
text.lobby.settings.unlock: Settings have been unlocked! All players can modify settings.
text.lobby.settings.lock: Settings have been locked! Only you and/or admins can modify settings.
text.lobby.settings.error.game_start: Start countdown is in progress! You cannot change settings at this time.
text.lobby.start.begin: Start countdown has begun! Game will begin in 10 seconds.
text.lobby.start.begin.max_player_warnin: Warning! Maximum number of players is 32! Excess players will be forced to spectate!
text.lobby.start.begin.min_player_warnin: Warning! Only 1 player detected! Cancel the countdown now if you wish to have more players!
text.lobby.start.error.minimum_players: At least one team must be populated to start the game!
text.lobby.teleporter.name: Personal Teleporter
text.lobby.teleporter.lore2: to the Admin room, where you can
text.lobby.teleporter.lore3: select your team and edit settings.
text.safety.survival1: Survival mode detected! You have been placed into adventure mode. To bypass this safety feature, please
text.safety.respawn1: Respawn detected! You cannot rejoin the game after dying. To bypass this safety feature, please
text.safety.bypass.warning1: WARNING! These safety features protect the game from entering an invalid state. By ignoring them, you run the risk of introducing unintended bugs.
text.safety.bypass.allow: You have been given a safety exemption.
text.safety.bypass.revoke: You have had your safety exemption revoked.
text.safety.playercap.on: The 32 player limit has been re-enabled.
text.safety.playercap.off: The 32 player limit has been disabled for solos.
text.safety.playercap.warning1: WARNING! This game is not balanced around having more than 32 players. Large lobbies are not recommended.
